snippet.title: Eastward - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Eastward now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/977880/Eastward/

Eastward is an adventure game for PC & Mac combining RPG elements, with a visual style inspired by 90s Japanese animation. As the world around falls to ruin, you play as hardworking digger John, who must guide a mysterious girl named Sam through dangerous decaying cities, inhabited by strange monsters, and even stranger people! 

For more information and to keep up to date with the latest development news, visit the Eastward website: https://eastwardgame.com/

Join the Chucklefish Discord: https://discord.gg/ReKC8df
Chat to us on Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/eastward/
Pixpil on Twitter: https://twitter.com/pixpilgames
Chucklefish on Twitter: https://twitter.com/ChucklefishLTD
